div.p: Specifies the authoritative source or rules for codes used to identify the maintenance agency of an EAS instance.
Specifies the authoritative source or rules for codes used to identify the maintenance agency of an EAS instance or the institution holding the materials being described.
repositoryEncoding specifies the authoritative source or rules for values used within agencyCode.
repositoryEncoding specifies the authoritative source or rules for values used within agencyCode and supplied in repositoryCode within unitId.

This can either be the ISO standard 15511 or an alternative code list. If the value "otherRepositoryEncoding" is selected, such an alternate code list should be specified in conventionDeclaration. This optional attribute is available only in control.
